Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:100% Hemolysis=39 µg/ml; 50% Hemolysis=11 µM; Sheep erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=21.1±2.6 µM; 100% Hemolysis=100 µM
